snippet: Given the size of a potential buyout for the biotechnology company Life Technologies, it was possible that a number of private equity firms would team up to complete a deal.
abstract: Biotech company Life Technologies says it is exploring potential sale and has retained banks to advise on the process; company is valued at an estimated $10.5 billion.
lead_paragraph: Given the size of a potential buyout for the biotechnology company Life Technologies, it was possible that a number of private equity firms would team up to complete a deal.

headline.seo: Life Technologies Says It Is Exploring Potential Sale
